nodes.text: Tk-216 was a stormtrooper for the Galactic Empire during the Galactic Civil War.

Tk-216 was a Human non-clone stormtrooper of the Galactic Empire from the planet Gala. Sometime following 0 BBY he was stationed at a small Imperial outpost outside the Quarantine Zone, an area of Dathomir that was infected by the Blackwing virus following an incident at the Imperial Research and Prison Facility.

Tk-216 is a Non-Player Character (NPC) in the MMORPG Star Wars Galaxies. Unlike most other stormtroopers in the game, Tk-216 is identified with a lower case "k." It is not clear if this was deliberate, or an error on the part of the developers.
